title: Technical Program Manager, iPhone
summary: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish...
description: Engagement in new product engineering builds, assist in reviewing production process and fixtures from manufacturing perspectives, capable of fixing hot issues is a plus...
key_qualifications: Dedication to design or production. The candidate who has the mechanical working experience is preferable. With understanding and strong passion on other precise assembly processes, such as electrically conductive adhesive or glue applications are welcomed. Familiar with mobile devices' knowledge is preferable. Excellent interpersonal and communication skill with capability to work independently and under pressure. Good spoken and written English with proficient Mandarin.
education_experience: University or college graduated (BS/MS) with major in EE or ME related degrees, with testing background is preferable.
